metadata.title: CVE-2024-46955 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in psi/zcolor.c in Artifex Ghostscript before10.04.0. There is an out-of-bounds read when reading color in Indexed colorspace.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-46955` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.10
ghostscript-x - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.10
libgs9 - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.10
libgs9-common - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.10').
